result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Sentencing hearing on January 12, 2023 at 02:30 pm.

10:27 AM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Armani Dashawn Jackson.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant enters a plea on 21CF776. Court will dismiss but read-in this case.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 12, 2023 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:06 PM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Armani Dashawn Jackson.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Matters were scheduled for a Final Pre-Trial this morning, but discussions were made regarding an offer off the record and Atty Anderson drove here in Milwaukee to discuss with Deft.
Atty Anderson - Deft is rejecting State's Offer.
DA Urmanski - State has extended best and final offer.
Atty Anderson has reviewed McMorris evidence and not planning to bring a Motion. Defense has no Motions in Limine.
Defense has reviewed State's Motions in imine and does not have any oppositions.
Court gives verbal colloquy to Deft on the record regarding Deft's intent to proceed to Trial.
Defense requesting that the State put the offer on the record.
State offered to amend to 2nd Degree Intentional Homicide and recommended 30-40 yrs IC and 20 yrs ES with Defense free to argue.
Court will bring in a panel and a half of Jurors, 28 to be seated, 7 strikes each and carry 2 alternates.
Deft to be equipped with RACC Belt.
Court grants State's Motions in Limine #1-13.
No objections to Proposed Jury Instructions.

3:41 PM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Armani Dashawn Jackson.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
DA Urmanski has spoken with Atty Anderson and has had realistic discussions regarding resolution. Believes resolution is possible, but not there yet. Requesting Trial to stay on and requesting a date next week prior to Trial.
950/Marsy's Law complied with. 
Atty Anderson agrees with analysis. Finally made progress on McMorris. 
DA Urmanski notes that no official offer has been made, only discussions regarding a resolution.
Atty Anderson has extended some proposals to the State.
(Court goes off record for scheduling)
3:47 pm - Court recalls and reschedules Final Pre-Trial for next week.
Victim's mother is present today but does not wish to make a statement.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Final pre-trial on October 21, 2022 at 11:45 am.
Final pre-trial on October 14, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

2:11 PM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson appeared by phone for Armani Dashawn Jackson.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
950/Marsy's Law complied with. Atty Anderson has possible McMorris evidence. Will file motion by 10-13-22, 950/Marsy's Law complied with.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Jury trial on October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

01:42 PM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Armani Dashawn Jackson.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
950/Marsy's Law complied with. Motions in limine approved by the court. Clerk to change JT date to begin 10-25-22 through 10-28-22
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:54 PM Prosecuting attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson in court, in custody at SCDC.  Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Armani Dashawn Jackson. 
Deputy Brock Peters sworn and testified; D, X.
Witness IDs deft in person. 
Probable Cause Found, Defendant bound over.
Information efiled/reading waived by Attorney Anderson, Not guilty plea entered all Counts. 
All MIL, JI, & witness lists to be filed 72hrs prior to FPT.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on September 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Atty. Anderson

4:17 PM Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson appeared by phone, in custody at SCDC.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Public Defenders office still looking to appoint an attorney.
Court removes preliminary hearing.
Atty Petros to be present at next hearing.
Deft waives time limits, Court finds good cause to extend time.
Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on July 1, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 15, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions: 
No contact directly or indirectly with the party named in the bail bond, except incidental while in custody.

12:27 PM Prosecuting attorney Daniel j Gabler Mr. in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Armani Dashawn Jackson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Solomon H Gatton appeared by video for Armani Dashawn Jackson. 
Advised of Rights. Complaint received, waived reading. Prelim requested. Probable cause found in complaint. 950/Marsy's Law complied with.
Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
